# GitHub Copilot AI Agent Prompt

## Request

Please bootstrap a new React TypeScript Capacitor app in this repository, integrating Kite for AI-powered code completions and suggestions.

### Requirements
- Use React with TypeScript
- Set up Capacitor for cross-platform support (web, iOS, Android)
- Integrate Kite for AI code assistance
- Provide initial README with setup instructions
- Commit all changes to a new branch and open a pull request

---
**Note:** This prompt is intended for an AI agent to automate the project setup. If you are a human contributor, please follow the above requirements or wait for the AI agent to complete the task.
